attributes.action: To implement the Tipping Point Campaign proposal:
attributes.additional_details:
*tipping refers to service charge, tips and gratuities 

This simple solution offers the transparency long called for by hospitality customers and employees alike. We need your support to make this a reality....

The proposed Tipping Point Campaign declaration questionnaire: 
www.tippingpointcampaign.org.uk/the-declaration/
attributes.background: The Tipping Point questionnaire to be completed by every UK hospitality business to declare how it handles *tipping. A printed copy to be displayed at each premises and on company websites so that consumers and staff can make an informed decision as to how they wish to engage with the business.

rejection.details:
Your petition seems to be calling on UK hospitality businesses, not the Government or Parliament, to take action. 

If you would like Parliament to change the law, to require all hospitality businesses to display their policy on tipping and make it available to their customers, you could start a new petition asking for that.
